Articles.Content:
I see there are more than 1 launch sites in Kerbin

So do i get an option to select where to launch?

2 minutes ago, domendemo said:

So do i get an option to select where to launch?

Yes, in the VAB, SPH, hover you mouse right below the green launch button, a grey tray should slide out showing all the launch options, just select the one you want and click launch!

What Commodoregamer118 said, but do make sure you have selected "Allow Additional Launchsites" in the In Game Settings (the ESC menu Setting: Difficulty Options)...

Edited August 26, 2020 by Wobbly Av8r
More accurate description of the location of Option

What additional sites do you have? Are they the two DLC sites, Woomerang and Dessert Launch Site, or are they from a mod like Kerbinside? Turn on 'allow additional launch sites' in the difficulty settings (esc > settings > difficulty settings at the top) and check if there are any Kerbal Konstruct/Kerbinside/etc. settings regarding opening their alternate launch sites for use or even showing them on the map.
